mapper.select: select car.id carId,car.counts carcounts,pc.id comId,pr.id regId,pc.name,pc.describe,pc.price,pc.counts,pa.postcode,pa.area,pa.address,pa.arelname,pa.aphone,pa.city, pa.province from power_car car inner join power_reg pr on car.reg_id=pr.id inner join power_commoditys pc on car.commodity_id=pc.id inner join power_address pa on pa.reg_id = pr.id where car.reg_id=#{userid}
mapper.update: update power_car set counts=counts+1 where id=#{id}
update power_car set counts=counts-1 where id=#{id}
